thread.title: Why You Shouldn't Confuse Comfort With Safety
thread.title_full: Why You Shouldn't Confuse Comfort With Safety

author: Entrepreneur Network
title: Why You Shouldn't Confuse Comfort With Safety

persons.name: e.l. james fredrik eklund seth godin

text:
Why You Shouldn't Confuse Comfort With Safety Learn from some of the world's best entrepreneurs in the eighth episode of Entrepreneur TV. Premium video network providing entertainment and education from successful entrepreneurs and thought leaders --- Shares March 16, 2017 
Entrepreneur TV focuses on entrepreneurs, startups and stars who have created their own products or launched their own businesses. You'll learn success secrets from celebrities, productivity hacks from billionaires and more. 
On the eighth episode of Entrepreneur TV, learn from stars like: E.L. James Fredrik Eklund Seth Godin . . . and more! 
"When I started writing these stories," says 50 Shades author E.L. James, who started the series as Twilight fan fiction, "I wrote them for myself." 
Plus Fredrik Eklund of Million Dollar Listing gives Entrepreneur a tour of a $20-million apartment in New York, and bestselling author Seth Godin explains why you sometimes need to be uncomfortable to be safe. 
To learn more, click play. 
Watch the new episodes Sundays on REELZ at 8am and catch up previous episodes here . Entrepreneur Network Entrepreneur Network is a premium video network providing entertainment, education and inspiration from successful entrepreneurs and thought leaders. EN is partnered with hundreds of top YouTube channels in the business vertical and...
